perturbation.original_text: 11.1 The Parties agree that all aspects of the content of this Agreement shall be treated as confidential and that no information in respect of the content and/or existence of this Agreement shall be disclosed without the prior written consent of both Parties.
perturbation.changed_text: 11.1 The Parties agree that all aspects of the content of this Agreement shall be treated as confidential and that any information in respect of the content and/or existence of this Agreement shall be disclosed without the prior written consent of both Parties, unless disclosure is required by a regulatory body, in which case no consent is required.
perturbation.explanation: The original text requires prior written consent for any disclosure. The modified text adds an exception where disclosure is required by a regulatory body, and explicitly states that in such cases no consent is required. This creates conflict as it is now unclear in which case both parties should agree before the contract can be disclosed.
